text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item title:
Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition, 1 Pack

Item keywords:
Spin into action, transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Cores and transforming Action Figures
Comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure and 3 collector game cards
text.Response A:
Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition, 1 Pack

Spin into action, transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Cores and transforming Action Figures. This set comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure and 3 collector game cards.
text.Response B: Spin into action and transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition! This pack comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure, and 3 collector game cards. The Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition features a sleek new design and a powerful glow-in-the-dark blade that makes it a must-have for any Monsuno collector. So, transform your world and collect them all!

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
